text: @ScramPratchett His glance flicked to Vimes for a moment, then put its scrap of paper neatly down in front of him in a lather of cheerful ecstasy.

passages.fragment: His glance flicked to Vimes for a moment ,
passages.full_quote: <used>His glance flicked to Vimes for a moment, t</used>hat there was a definite improvement

passages.fragment: for a moment , then put its scrap of paper neatly down in front of
passages.full_quote: The other stood quivering <used>for a moment, then put its scrap of paper neatly down in front of</used> her and disappeared as well

They find some isolated spot with very few people around, then land right by some poor soul whom no one's ever going to believe and then strut up and <used>down in front of him</used> wearing silly antennae on their heads and making beep beep noises

passages.fragment: in front of him in a lather of cheerful ecstasy
passages.full_quote: Colin bobbed along in the air <used>in front of him in a lather of cheerful ecstasy</used>
